start.description: Offset of the box in the full file (starting by 0)

size.description: Size of box in bytes including the size itself and the type

type.description: Four caracters in 4ccc format or 16 bytes uuid defining the box type (e.g. 'meta')

dataOffset.description: Offset of the data in the box from the start of the box (not from the start of the file). Commonly 8

dataView.description: Data contained in the box after the header (commonly size and type) Can be partial or null.
